display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                        
[media]
# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

[media]
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

[media]
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

[media]
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

[media]
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=wL0qETXE0IIQ7kNvwHguBA5&_nc_oc=AdlXf3HOTjxYtO0aTpSlldWstMXrfzWS6vjLfW2bDSFrEgQdV6WcXiIxfnthDCz0Ng8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ZmS9-jjB8Y4Olkku9sN6Xg&oh=00_AfpMR2bXKcaT6HMGsuYC-FXAZ_WO2vZxvZQDIMjGKEy5lQ&oe=6975E809)
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lohm_97HylkQ7kNvwEia7T0&_nc_oc=Adlq8_XLX3CZikqeOtVw_6i_DJrfxhP2AHXeFmaXSlZlIQJPLXjb0-nCRWmLfr1zi5g&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ZmS9-jjB8Y4Olkku9sN6Xg&oh=00_Afp_zjKFAqoBsjZC2daqzGyqOWa3VcUOydh4yVBiY1OtmA&oe=6975F55D)
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=m97YFTjYeooQ7kNvwEkHZmi&_nc_oc=AdnVzqDDDeJYR11Fk4E7-r40M_-p5tze__0n97MFLD2EIvCWD7ibEAN5ZFhrQcUus38&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ZmS9-jjB8Y4Olkku9sN6Xg&oh=00_AfoW1NC2S7XV-eEC1c2kQuxsQ1FeVyEo5RUs2AQxXv6R9w&oe=6975E312)
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=vILRawieCuUQ7kNvwHaX6sv&_nc_oc=AdlMXnOnULIjz8Rd1yOBqnohAQ_E_If3KmiwqBXQxM4Q5pcWtKjXOcnq01moN2ssncA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ZmS9-jjB8Y4Olkku9sN6Xg&oh=00_AfoqxatSEElt3QqcrZ1MFQoE18HxiczkLSniPkao_IldMg&oe=6975FD42)
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.
